optimization.stochastic.operators

Interface HeterogenousMutationInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MutationInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeterogenousFloatMutator, HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator

    public interface HeterogenousMutationInterface
extends MutationInterface
    This interface extends the basic mutation interface in that it supports heterogenous mutations rates where each feature can mutate at a different rate. In this particular case, all feature have the same mutation probability , but different mutation magnitudes.
